website_summaries.verdict: One of the most versatile styling dryers available on the market at an affordable price.
pros: Single-handle design makes it easy to style hair with one hand while using product or other tools with the other
Comes with several different attachments for different hairstyles, hair types, and usages
cons: Dryer tends to overheat on the highest setting

website_summaries.verdict: Good budget price makes the dryer a great replacement option.
pros: Unique form factor makes the dryer more portable than comparable models
Provides the same quality of hair drying as more expensive options
Comes with different attachments for styling
cons: Included attachments are substandard compared to more expensive models

customer_reviews.title: I love my Andis Ceramic blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: I love my Andis Ceramic blow dryer. Not only does it get our hair dry quickly but it also straightens at the Sam's time. Can't get no better for me and my family. Quick and easy!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Alexander

customer_reviews.title: KNOCK OFF
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a real Andis blow dryer. In the process of drying my hair it shut off 5 times because of overheating. It is a knockoff of Andis products. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HAZARD
customer_reviews.text: I like the sleek design and color of this product, However, I am most dissatisfied with its function/lack thereof. The dryer trips off after a very short time. When it cools down, it automatically turns itself back on. I had gone to another bathroom to finish drying my hair with my trustworthy, clunky old Conair. Upon returning to our master bath, I was shocked and dismayed to see the Andis turned back on and blowing in the wind. Had I left, this would have created a fire hazard. Caveat emptor!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing even on my super fine thin straight hair!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am sure that I don't have the hair type this was marketed to but it has been life changing. I have super fine hair with just a slight wave to it. Just enough to be annoying with out actually having any body or curl to my hair. With this hairdryer I don't have to use a flat iron, product or anything else and my hair seems to look cleaner longer? No more 2nd day oil slick. Can't recommend this highly enough!
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: What a 4c girl needs!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS! I have 4c hair with a tendency to shrink almost 75%! This gets the job done! I also use this on my three daughters' hair, we all have 4a-4c with high shrinkage, and this is one tough dryer! The attachments hold on for dear life and still have not broken!
customer_reviews.author: Tonia

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the shape makes it easier to handle for me, even when I was blow drying the back. I used the attachment combs and is was fantastic. I gets really hot and has a auto stop feature to cool down. Perfect! Images are after blowdrying then after flat iron.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin and Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great hair dryer for all hair types
customer_reviews.text: My son and I have very different hair types and I learned quickly that the way I wash and style my hair, doesn’t work for him. Most importantly the hair drying process can be challenging. I purchased this dryer because I wanted the comb feature to help dry and lay his hair down without frizzing. Some of this is controlled by the styling cream I use in his hair, but how I dry it matters just as much. This new dryer was light and was cool to the touch. His hair came out lovely and I would recommend this dryer to anyone looking for a new dryer at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Happy In Texas

customer_reviews.title: Over heats and stops working several
customer_reviews.text: I’d give this a 5 Star if it could work longer than 2 minutes. I’ve been using brush dryers for years, my favorite was Lava Gold, which I can’t get anywhere anymore. I was used to having to get a new one every year, so it’s not that I’m unreasonable. I like that this one’s softer bristles are durable and more stiff to help straighten better. But it takes forever to dry my hair because the dryer constantly stops due to overheating and I have to blow on it until it cools down so I can start it up again. Super annoying! I wonder if I got a faulty one, but another reviewer said same thing.
customer_reviews.author: NAL

customer_reviews.title: Love this hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: Love this hair dryer! It's perfect for blow drying long silky hair without getting a bunch of knots. I bought it because my Vidal Sassoon VS783 1875- Dryer and Styler broke and it's price increased from around $25 last time I bought it to $69.00! I like the Andis 1875 better, so I'm glad Videl Sassoon raised their price - that price raise forced me to consider other options and I found one I like better for much less money.
customer_reviews.author: Mary - Hockessin, DE

customer_reviews.title: Not reccomended for thick hair
customer_reviews.text: Do not reccomend if you have thick hair. Does not give off enough air when blowing. If you have thick hair it takes forever. Sometimes it even just cuts off - I think that's because it's working so hard.
customer_reviews.author: Liz S

customer_reviews.title: Broke after only two years :(
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer turned out to be a huge disappointment. The attachments were unusable because they would just fall off, so I threw them away. This hair dryer worked alright but suddenly stopped working a few days ago. I have to smack it to turn it on and it constantly turns off while I’m trying to dry my hair. It’s horrible. This dryer also has damaged my hair greatly and made it frizzier, even with protective heat spray. I ended up ordering a $200 hair dryer from Ulta in hopes that it’ll actually work and LAST. I do not recommend this hair dryer at all. Avoid!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Never turning back
customer_reviews.text: This has been my All-Time favorite blow dryer. It’s a lot easier to handle than the standard blow dryer, especially when you’re doing your own hair. I may have to purchase another one soon as it’s now starting to conk out after a few minutes on high heat (I’ve had it for years). It still has more life in it though. I don’t think I will ever go back. And the combing mechanism on the end is a god send. I go through them kinda quickly because my hair is so thick sometimes the teeth break, but you can buy the attachment by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Brown

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This is THE BEST dryer for thick curly/coily hair. And hands down the best dryer I’ve ever owned. My only complaint is that I have to fight with the attachments to stay on. I use a denmon like brush when I don’t feel like that fight. Although most dryers last a good long while I’m tempted to purchase another just in case they go extinct.
customer_reviews.author: Nic S.

customer_reviews.title: Coarse-straight to body-straight in 20 mins
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Price is great for package. Cute style. Handle doesn't get hot Cons: Dirability is medium. This is not for amateurs. You have to detangle hair first then start from side comb and move down to brush if needed. I stop at small comb. I dont need totally silky. Get a dryer glove. The heat will burn your fingers if you are trying to smooth and comb dry. Overall: Good for the cost. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Taracha M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beards
customer_reviews.text: Updated- 4 months later it overheated and died, only from minimal use- on a beard. Wouldn’t purchase again. I got this for my husband, he had been using a straightening brush for his beard every morning but with it still having some moisture from showering it wasn’t working as well as it could. Well with this thing and the fine comb attachment that comes with it, his beard has never looked better, it straightens and dries as the same time leaving it looking silky and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Takemetothebeach

customer_reviews.title: Cheap attachments
customer_reviews.text: It's ok yall. Attachments break easy af if u ain't got straight white girl hair. Cheap but aiight... wont buy again. U get what u pay 4.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for coarse hair
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this dryer to any natural girl with thick coarse hair. I was afraid that the comb attachments would break but they withstood the test. You have total control unlike other blow dryers. Was able to detangle my hair and get a nice even smooth finish on the medium setting. For a salon blowout I recommend a high setting along with a flat iron and you will get perfect results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thick hair girls beware
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been on the hunt for a inexpensive blow dryer with a comb attachment. This one meets that criteria, however if you’re like me and have super thick long african textured hair , this will just leave you with a big puffy mess. It doesn’t get hot enough, so I have to blow dry my hair in small sections to get my hair completely dry. Also, when toggling between heat and speed settings I noticed there’s a smell similar to that of something burning that lasts for about 5 seconds. I’ve only used it 3 times.
customer_reviews.author: Taja Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have natural super tightly curled hair. This dryer gets so hot it got my hair bone straight no perm needed. Ive had it for a couple years now and its still going strong. I'd give it 5 stars but the attachments are delicate. but if you have a looser curl texture than I do it will work for you. I'd buy this again if my current one breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Rashidah

customer_reviews.title: Everything works good
customer_reviews.text: I like it, its easy to hold and blowdrys my hair really good, i have 4c type.
customer_reviews.author: Nazzy

customer_reviews.title: Compact and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: I will have to do an updated review about the functionality and durability of the item. However, upon unboxing I realised that this product is smaller and more compact than its previous version, which I had also owned. The item is aesthetically appealing and I like the hook to hang it. I powered it, and it works. But as I said before upon using it over a period of time I will comment on its durability and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Ta Pa

customer_reviews.title: I like this ceramic dryer
customer_reviews.text: I like this ceramic dryer. Boxed nicely. Dryer is as described, The only reason I am giving it a four-star rating is because the teeth in the finer comb broke upon first usage. I am not giving it a lower star, because the customer must determine the proper comb with appropriate tooth-size to use. Thicker hair must be thoroughly detangled before usage; the family member who used this product found out the hard way. Nevertheless, I would recommend it, When using the appropriate comb for the hair type, it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha-Dorcas

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this. The drying power is poor and quality is not too good. I purchased a new one and the seller sent me a used one.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: GREAT hair dryer, great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT hairdryer! I have been through so many dryers and none of them have been this nice, no matter how much I paid for them. I love the attachments. The dryer is very easy to hold and has plenty of heat and power. It is better than some dryers that professionals have used when cutting my hair. Best hair dryer I have ever had at a very reasonable price. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Plymill

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 14 year old daughter. We both love it! It's lightweight, easy to use and not as loud as the Conair we purchased before. The Conair started breaking down on us not even a year after we purchased it and broke for good in about a year. The Andis seems sturdy and I also prefer the attachments on the Andis. They work well and at this point, I'm very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Love the comb attachments
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in the house has natural curly hair. I use this blow dryer to help stretch my curls before flat-ironing it. This hair dryer was purchased because of the price and the comb attachments. So far I like the dryer. The color is pretty cool. I am hoping that I am able to find combs for it since they always seem to break and this is the third hand dryer I have bought. I decided to try Andis because I saw where you could buy replacement comb attachments. My others were Conair but I could not find replacement attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Qiana

customer_reviews.title: Ok, not as great as the older version
customer_reviews.text: So I love this dryer... or at least loved the older version. Mine was about 5-6 years old when the element finally went caput. The warm setting doesn't really get warm. But if you start it on HIGH, then switch down to warm it will stay warm for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Herrick

customer_reviews.title: Used to love it.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a miracle! Before I was slowly blow drying my hair with a brush and a blow dryer. This is 2 in 1 and it works fast! My hair doesn't burn, but I tend to go fast and I've been doing this for a while. Be careful where you plug it in because I definitely blew a circuit once or twice with this thing. She's mighty powerful. UPDATE: After using this for two months, it short circuited and died on me. Very disappointed in the product because it did so well but doesn't last long. Will not be re-ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Rozzie

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last.
customer_reviews.text: I used Conair before but decided to try this one because it looks the same but costs about a half. Used it only a few times and it stopped working. Went back to Conair brand which normally lasts me about four years of daily use. Return was processed right away.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use/Get a handle on
customer_reviews.text: I'm an African/Caribbean- American woman with 4C natural hair. I'm just starting to develop a routine for styling my hair, and, to me, this product is difficult to maneuver and didn't stretch/elongate my hair as I would have liked. Plus, it gets really hot and my hair still didn't come out as blown out and manageable as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: LaReinaNegrita758

customer_reviews.title: Dries quickly
customer_reviews.text: My last blow dryer broken within a year of purchasing. This one is better and dried both my hair (4C) and daughter's (4B/4C) very quickly. My daughter's hair is shoulder length and very thick. Her complaining has deceased. 😀 My hair doesn't feel completely fried and dried out.
customer_reviews.author: Lori S

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new hair dryer and figured this would be perfect, bc my current one is the same brand, just a different/older model. Basically, the are the same dryer. I wish I like this one but I don't. It's definitely made more cheaply as far as the actual unit. It doesn't get as hot as the older vrsion either, and for my type hair, I need that heat. The combs also tend to pop off of the unit once it gets hot, and And definitely sucks. I'll most likely be returning this item as it doesn't suit my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this
customer_reviews.text: Don't believe the "High-velocity airflow" statement - this hair dryer only had a low & medium setting. I don't have what people would call a thick head of hair and it took a long time for me to dry what I have. The hair brush was flimsy and the bristles were mangled when I received it. Another thing I didn't like was that it is quite heavy and the handle is long so it makes it seem even heavier when you are holding it. I ended up returning it since it was pretty useless to to.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but is not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this hair dryer twice and I love it! I have wavy hair and I can more easily straighten my hair with this hair dryer than with a typical round one. The only reason I took one star away is because my first one only last about two years and because the little comb fell apart after a few months. I wish it was a bit more sturdy, but I do like the dryer itself.
customer_reviews.author: king_tinac

customer_reviews.title: Attachments Are Not Durable; Blower/Heating Satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: There are no problems with the heating element or mechanism itself; it functions well. The solid comb attachment does not last more than about 2-3 months if you have thick hair. The teeth will break off rapidly at that point.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron S.

customer_reviews.title: Worst Styler ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute worst styler I have ever used. I have been using these for several years and thought I would give this brand a chance. It would not stay on for longer than 2 minutes. It was a complete waste of money. I will stick to Conair from now on. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Give This a Try!
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a neat hairdryer and I love all of the different settings between the hairbrushes and cool and warm settings. It does a great job and I really like the result. The price is very fair. I was not sure about the shape of it when I bought since I had never had a hairdryer like it, but it truly makes a different and dries my hair more evenly and even quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Atlguy101

customer_reviews.title: This hairdryer is fine considering I love this style of hairdryer and there ...
customer_reviews.text: This hairdryer is fine considering I love this style of hairdryer and there are so few out there. Sometimes it cuts off after a minute or two, and at first I thought it was overheating, but once it turns back on (usually after a minute or so) it stays on for a good 10 minutes so that can't be it. Seems like there's a short circuit somewhere that keeps getting triggered. I'll hear a clicking noise and then it's completely fine. Just FYI - if you want to deal with that, then it's fine. Otherwise, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy/Loose attachments
customer_reviews.text: Attachments do not stay in place and are made of really thin plastic. Doesn't seem to provide high heat as noted. This new version is even worse than the older versions of this dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Truebizz

customer_reviews.title: Great price for Andis 1875 watt with 3 attachments included.
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled when my Andis 1875-watt hair dryer with 3 attachments arrived. It was packaged very securely and fast delivery. It has two options for the output wattages. The attachments slide on and off easily. The attachments are kind of thin feeling, so I try to be extra careful not to break them. It doesn't get as hot as my old gold n hot did but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Andrea

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: This style of hair dryer is a must have for me. I grew up trying all sorts of tools and to keep my very curly hair straight and nozzle blow dryers were hard to maneuver with the tools. I KEEP these on hand especially when they run $25 or less.
customer_reviews.author: A. Beal

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: It's not quite as good, in terms of air velocity, as the VS1875; however, much better than the Conair 1875. It's OK and does the job. I have a chin length bob haircut so the time that I actually use it each day is less than 5 minutes. BTW, the attachments from the VS1875 fit this hairdryer.
customer_reviews.author: Toulee

customer_reviews.title: Good settings, soft brush
customer_reviews.text: Good variety of settings. Brush is stiff enough to penetrate hair but soft enough to prevent scalp irritation. Small negative is that the brush cracked after a couple of months. Will need to order a replacement. I recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: GJL

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Not for 4c hair . Comb is not sturdy enough
customer_reviews.author: Deyja

customer_reviews.title: 5 Year Warranty!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know anything about hair, whether I have 3 or 4, A, B, or C 🤷🏽‍♀️ BUT what I do know is that I’m a African American woman and this blow dryer right HERE - dang near blow dries my hair STRAIGHT 👩🏾 . 1000% recommend on the warranty alone. P.S. Not lightweight, but also not heavy weight. About the same as a normal blow dryer in weight. Does relieve the wrist pain from having to use two hair tools because of the attachments!
customer_reviews.author: Taperra

customer_reviews.title: NATURAL HAIR LOVES IT
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 3C-4A hair type (for all my natural girls) and I just had to have one of these after using my sister's own. It works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Rhea

customer_reviews.title: Overheats
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blow dryer at the end of November. I've used it 5 times. 4/5 times that I've used it, it overheated and shuts off. After leaving it alone for about 5 mins or so, it will turn back on. I would not recommend this blow dryer. I would have returned it but I just haven't had time. My return time just expired on Jan. 31.. smh. I will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Le'Starr Rose

customer_reviews.title: Love this Hair Dryer!
customer_reviews.text: I received the Hair Dryer today. I used it on my daughters hair and it worked just as promised. I am African American and this is the first hair dryer that I have purchased that has actually lived up to its claims. My daughter has thick hair and this dryer literally cut the drying time in half. The handle is comfortable to hold and the attachments work perfectly. Also this hair dryer is much quieter than older models similar to this one. I would definitely recommend this hair dryer to anyone who hates long drying times. It gets the job done and it gives your hair a natural shine.
customer_reviews.author: Creed70

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!
customer_reviews.text: I think the one i got was fake or it is just that bad on high it burns even its accessories and on low it just doesn’t do anything, very low quality and the accessories were breaking off i simply got rid of it
customer_reviews.author: nevine gamal

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Dries hair fast. Comb attachment seems very sturdy. I bought this as a replacement for my third Gold n Hot dryer to bite the dust and am optimistic on how this one will last.
customer_reviews.author: PAS

customer_reviews.title: Have used this brand for years and it works great for my hair style
customer_reviews.text: Have used this brand for years and it works great for my hair style. They last well, I just wear them out from so much use. I especially love the new design of the ergonomic handle, so comfortable to hold and maneuver as I'm drying my hair. Also easier to press the "cold shot" button when needed!
customer_reviews.author: Tina S. Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Gets really out, but goes out in the middle of the blow dry
customer_reviews.text: I really love how hot this gets and how it straightens my thick hair, however, my sister and I both have them and they go out all the time. You have to wait about 5 mins. This seems like a common problem that I would think would be addressed.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Combs are durable
customer_reviews.text: The best part about this dryer are the durable attachments. I’ve had several of these, all different brands and the combs never last past a few uses. So far, this one has been excellent!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great Dryer and Easy To Operate.
customer_reviews.text: It is a good dryer. The comb needs to be more secure when in use though.
customer_reviews.author: K. M. Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Light weight.
customer_reviews.text: This product is light weight and gets your hair straight. I used the brush. Should I had used the comb attachment, I think it would have been even straighter.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: For a woman with long, thick hair, this dryer is awesome. I love it. I love the attachments and it speeds up my drying time. Worth it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great value and features
customer_reviews.text: Great for drying my hair. My hair is somewhat thick and the wide tooth comb made it so much easier. The temperature is just right to get the job done. The brush is to stiff. Snags my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good power
customer_reviews.text: Works well, just the combs are kinda cheap and broke within 3 used. The power is good, but the attachments are not sturdy enough for thick course hair.
customer_reviews.author: KDG

customer_reviews.title: Works great on ethnic hair
customer_reviews.text: Product was shipped to me in the allotted time. I am happy with my purchase. The product is as described and works very well. The Combs do not fall off when I'm combing my hair I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Joswen E.

customer_reviews.title: very good hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I have used this type of hair dryer for years and this one is as good as any that I have owned. I have thick hair, so I use the highest setting and it will dry my hair in about 2 1/2 to 3 minutes. I don't use the comb attachments, just the brush attachment. The handle has a slight curve at the end for better handling. I would give it a 5 star rating but my brush attachment came with the bristles smashed and deformed, but it does not affect the performance of the dryer. Ionic dryers are great in the winter when the air in the house is so dry.
customer_reviews.author: James Griffin

customer_reviews.title: IT DIED ON ME!
customer_reviews.text: After 4 yrs 2 month and 7 days My dryer finally died. I am so sad. The reason I do not give it 5 stars is because I only my used it a hand full of times being that my daughter and I are natural. Tonight I go to use it and it start to rattle and burn. That smoke came out. It missed up my plans for hair doing.
customer_reviews.author: Tarafied

customer_reviews.title: ... my hair with this product the comb keeps popping like it is about to come off the blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: When I'm doing my hair with this product the comb keeps popping like it is about to come off the blow dryer. My other blow dryer never did that and I can't really get down to my roots with worrying whether or not it is going to break.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Roey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to manage
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product but the combs a a bit fragile for African American hair. It’s easy to hold and manage while drying hair but it will not travel well...too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: CGH

customer_reviews.title: Could use more air speed
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a mostly quality unit but the highest setting still doesn't give you a lot of air speed, just a lot of heat. The cold shot button is hard to push where it is located, and should have been placed on the opposite side of the handle. Notice that the fan speed slows and becomes erratic when using the cold shot button, but returns to normal after release. Unsure how long this unit will last. Not sure where the "ceramic" part of the dryer comes in since the internals look like a standard heat element setup. Don't like this as much as the Vidal Sassoon unit that it is replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Vinnie T

customer_reviews.title: Not as powerful as expected, but gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient and neat design since you can have the brush/comb attachments, but you sacrifice drying power. Takes about twice as long as a traditional hand dryer, but still a cool tool to have for styling.
customer_reviews.author: Yamila Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: Hair dryer is very suitable for my fine, short and not very thick hair. I used it on the lowest setting and it felt just right: gentle and not extremely hot. I also liked its comb attachment: it helped me dry hair faster. Comparing this dryer to my older Philips (I moved so I had to leave it in another country), I must note that this dryer provides weaker blow. I think it is because of much bigger output vent. Minus 1 star because there is no ceramic heating element - just wires.
customer_reviews.author: Anna K.

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many blow-dryers first off. I came across this one, because it was the last choice I had when my dryer went out and I borrowed one. It got my hair straight with ease. The fact that it is shaped like a comb makes it easy to blow dry and gets dry really fast! I purchased all the andis products for women and I like them all.
customer_reviews.author: Mai

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughter go-to blow dryer. We bought this to replace her last that went out after 6 years. She has extremely thick hair and this straightens it easily and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: TSL

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and multipurpose
customer_reviews.text: This is the most powerful handheld hair dryer I have ever owned. It dried my hair in less than five minutes and the attachment worked like a charm. Great quality am a very satisfied customer. You would not regret buying this dryer. I am really please, the attachments are also not flimsy. My hair length is shoulder length and thin..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in power, but I love the shape
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dryer after my old one died- it was a different brand but a similar shape: I really like blow dryers that are this shape, and come with the diffuser attachments. I think they make styling my frizzy hair much easier, and I love not having to balance a brush and the dryer. However, this dryer seems to lack power. I was very disappointed by how little air seems to come out (and too slowly), and the heat settings stink: the medium is not hot enough, but the high setting seems to be too hot. Thank goodness I didn't spend a lot on this product, because I'm sure I will buy a different dryer soon.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to grip
customer_reviews.text: The brush attachment is pretty stiff, but the one from my previous dryer was softer and fits on this dryer. What I like most is that the shape of the handle makes it easy to hold while using it (especially helpful if you have arthritis in your hands).
customer_reviews.author: RLC

customer_reviews.title: Great blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: I African American with fine hair and this just works! This is second one a biught because the older moldel is striaght kind and I can't find the combs to fit so I've been using this product for five years now.
customer_reviews.author: Simone Cropper

customer_reviews.title: ITS OK BUT...
customer_reviews.text: Its ok and great that its dual voltage. I would have greatly loved it if its attachments could stay on long enough to comb a small and first attempt portion of hair. It frustrating having to keep picking up any of the attachment to attach only to come off again with the first attempt of using
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE PLEASE DONT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this item March 21st and used it once a week after receiving it when to use it again for the second time yesterday April 24th and the dryer started making a weird noise and smoking. I've purchase Andis blow dryers in the past before and always love them very disappointed that this dryer only lasted for one use please do not purchase this blow dryer. Now I'm forced to go look elsewhere for a blow dryer maybe I should just stick to my local stores instead of Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Logan Jr

customer_reviews.title: Shuts off after a short period of time right out the box
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blow-dryer because it's in the style I like which is hard to find in the area I live in. The first time o took it out of the box to use it, I had it on for maybe 5-10 minutes and I don't know if it over heated or what but it shut itself off. I unplugged it for a little while and started it up again and once again it shut off. After those first couple of times I used it one more time after and it worked until I was finished.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Romain

customer_reviews.title: Works for a good while unless you have super thick hair.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in Feb. and the combs have finally broken in Nov. I have 4c type hair if that helps you make the decision. Will be purchasing a new set of combs!!
customer_reviews.author: Yaya

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and would only work well on low. Then after two more weeks it started throwing sparks and smoke like it was going on fire. It’s a hazardous item to purchase. I forgot to put a review. But I won’t be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Less time to work on hair
customer_reviews.text: I live this hair dryer, it's makes easier for my to straighten my hair by myself. The heat is very hot and takes less time for me to work on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaille

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This product does not overheat. It has 4 heating levels, and I am glad that it has not dried my hair out, and that of my daughters. Great product to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: D. Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Great for beards
customer_reviews.text: This works very well for my husband's beard. The multiple attachments give him many options.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: The best hair dryer!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hair dryer I've ever had. It's light weight and heats up quickly. It dries your hair fast and gives a nice sheen. I love the 3 attachments as well. I highly recommend it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: dooneygirl14

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I must say that I am extremely disappointed with this “new” model because the quality of the new attachable combs are horrible! 1) the combs do not stay secure while blow drying thicker hair 2) the quality of the combs are very cheap & several bristles have broken while using this blow dryer! The older model was manufactured with better materials. I would not purchase this particular hair dryer ever again.
customer_reviews.author: KENDELL THOMPSON

customer_reviews.title: Very weak dryer, even the cheaper alternatives work better
customer_reviews.text: My $10 CVS travel dryer has more power than this, no way this is 1875W. Very dissapointing purchase. Also a bit too large and clunky to use with attachments, and they are especially useless if you have fine or thin hair.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it..but
customer_reviews.text: I like this hair dryer..But, the attachments require you to be extra careful because they will slip off if you try to comb through a loose tangle. It feels bulky in my hand. The drying capacity GOOD have been better. It's a meh!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Turner

customer_reviews.title: All hair types
customer_reviews.text: I am just starting out learning how to do my own hair. This is so easy to uses it’s not like most hair dryers when the comb gets yanked out by my hair. 10/10 recommend to all hair types.
customer_reviews.author: Robinson’s Family

customer_reviews.title: Gets Hott!
customer_reviews.text: Works good gets hot. I have natural curly coarse hair the combs are not that strong that it comes with I know they will break soon! :( they keep coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Hipbbw

customer_reviews.title: I wrapped my hair up in a silk scarf that night and hair came out feeling like it had been flat ironed
customer_reviews.text: Very fast drying time. Added some oil once hair was dryed and then went over with the blow dryer again. Felt smooth to the touch. I wrapped my hair up in a silk scarf that night and hair came out feeling like it had been flat ironed. I didn't expect this hair dryer to do so well given the cheap price. I was wrong this is one of the best hair dryers I've ever had. My hair is relaxed by the way and extremely coarse. I am going to buy another one in case they stop carrying it.
customer_reviews.author: DIY rookie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent blow dryer until it breaks.
customer_reviews.text: Not quite sure what happened to this blow dryer. It worked really really well the first three months I had it. Then after my sister, who has extremely thick hair,used it, it started vibrating violently every time we turned it on. Also the heating mechanism in it died or something, because only cool air started coming out. Excellent hair dryer at first; something I would've recommended to all my friends with thick hair, since I have thick hair, but it broke so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for thick hair
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done, but I don’t recommend for hair that is thick. My daughter has type 4 hair with shrinkage and the comb slips off a bit when drying.
customer_reviews.author: LittleSunnyOnWheels

customer_reviews.title: The added output plus the outstanding price from Andis!
customer_reviews.text: Finally an 1875 output for a unit that has attachments! What's so hard about that ??... revlon, clairol, and all the other name brands??!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dogs Rule

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time today...and it worked GREAT!! Easy to use, and it was a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Great first dryer!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing dryer for fine hair! My daughter has super fine hair. This is a great dryer for her to get used to managing all we do in the styling process! It is super lightweight! I have super thick naturally curly hair that would take eons to dry with this dryer but that said we all have different needs. My daughter would fry her hair if she used my dryer, plus it is way to heavy and requires the skill of holding while brushing! This is a great product for teenagers!! Mom approved!!!
customer_reviews.author: Life Learner

customer_reviews.title: Super, duper loud
customer_reviews.text: Super, duper loud.... Hurts my ear. Dry's well. Would not purchase again because I like being able to hear and wanna keep my eardrums healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Elle G.

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job
customer_reviews.text: Great dryer and I love the comb attachments for detangling and straightening.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: If in a bind, this is the dryer for you. I bought this because it was a brand I trust and it was affordable. I assumed that because of the price it wouldn’t last. It does. It’s dries quickly and effectively and packs away nice and neat. All the different combs are sturdy and useful.
customer_reviews.author: Aarons Lady

customer_reviews.title: I love this brand!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brand for years, my last one lasted me over 9 yrs that's what prompt me to buy another one; however, I must say this one is different. Like some other users said, the air is not as strong as my last one but for some reason my hair was dried fast and my hair is not short at all, in fact it touches my bras hook on my back. I was gonna return it but after my hair was dried, there was a shine through it that my last one did not do. Not only it was shinny but also it was light. I'm definitely keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Naomie Pearl Cledanor

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright
customer_reviews.text: What I don’t like about the blow dryer is the comb it’s not wide enough for me because I have natural kinky thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: KiKiGraham

customer_reviews.title: Works Well and Has a Really Long Cord
customer_reviews.text: Love the long cord. Works well and not too heavy. Wish the brush attachment was rounder. Attachments are easy to attach if you take a minute to lock in place.
customer_reviews.author: P Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Did not work on the higher settings at all!
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect style hairdryer but when i went to use it on my wet hair before work for the very first time, it only worked on the low setting. It took me three times as long to dry my hair than usual. Apparently they don't check the switches before they send them from the factory. I've never returned anything before, but I just may have to now, unless I can somehow jimmy that darned switch!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki J Fuchs

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I have the Conair and Vidal Sassoon version of this type of dryer and I like the Conair much better. I have thick curly hair and I use it to straighten. The air strength and heat just doesn’t get the job done. I only use the brush attachment. May work better for thinner or less wavy hair
customer_reviews.author: Cortney Mazur

product_meta.title: Andis 82105 1875-Watt Tourmaline Ceramic Ionic Styling Hair Dryer, Gold
product_meta.description: Color:GoldHS-2 hair styler product type: Hot air styler technical information plate material: Ceramic power description power source: AC supply power consumption.
feature_bullets: Even-heat ceramic technology preserves natural oils and seals in moisture - creating smooth, silky, frizz-free hair
Ionic dries hair faster by breaking up water molecules
Cool shot button to lock in style
3 air/heat settings with cool shot button

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
